### runFixI1Copies() {#a7cf6d1c87b479dd800293a9194aaff9a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool runFixI1Copies (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree">MachineDominatorTree</a> &amp; MDT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepostdominatortree">MachinePostDominatorTree</a> &amp; MPDT)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Lower all instructions that def or use vreg&#95;1 registers.

In a first pass, we lower COPYs from vreg&#95;1 to vector registers, as can occur around inline assembly. We do this first, before vreg&#95;1 registers are changed to scalar mask registers.

Then we lower all defs of vreg&#95;1 registers. Phi nodes are lowered before all others, because phi lowering looks through copies and can therefore often make copy lowering unnecessary.

Definition at line <a href="#l00866">866</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siloweri1copies-cpp">SILowerI1Copies.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass lowers all occurrences of i1 values (with a vreg&#95;1 register class)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to lane masks (32 / 64-bit scalar registers). The pass assumes machine SSA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// form and a wave-level control flow graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Before this pass, values that are semantically i1 and are defined and used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// within the same basic block are already represented as lane masks in scalar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers. However, values that cross basic blocks are always transferred</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between basic blocks in vreg&#95;1 virtual registers and are lowered by this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The only instructions that use or define vreg&#95;1 virtual registers are COPY,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PHI, and IMPLICIT&#95;DEF.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper class that determines the relationship between incoming values of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// phi in the control flow graph to determine where an incoming value can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// simply be taken as a scalar lane mask as-is, and where it needs to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// merged with another, previously defined lane mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The approach is as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - Determine all basic blocks which, starting from the incoming blocks,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    a wave may reach before entering the def block (the block containing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    phi).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - If an incoming block has no predecessors in this set, we can take the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    incoming value as a scalar lane mask as-is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  -- A special case of this is when the def block has a self-loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - Otherwise, the incoming value needs to be merged with a previously</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    defined lane mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - If there is a path into the set of reachable blocks that does &#95;not&#95; go</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    through an incoming block where we can take the scalar lane mask as-is,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    we need to invent an available value for the SSAUpdater. Choices are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    0 and undef, with differing consequences for how to merge values etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TODO: We could use region analysis to quickly skip over SESE regions during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       the traversal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/phiincominganalysis"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/phiincominganalysis/#abb21aa4a6197f05bf7b9184f7a44378a">PhiIncomingAnalysis</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepostdominatortree">MachinePostDominatorTree</a> &amp;PDT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo">SIInstrInfo</a> &#42;TII;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each reachable basic block, whether it is a source in the induced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subgraph of the CFG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, bool&gt;</a> ReachableMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> ReachableOrdered;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Stack;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/phiincominganalysis/#abb21aa4a6197f05bf7b9184f7a44378a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/phiincominganalysis/#abb21aa4a6197f05bf7b9184f7a44378a">PhiIncomingAnalysis</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepostdominatortree">MachinePostDominatorTree</a> &amp;PDT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo">SIInstrInfo</a> &#42;TII)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns whether \\p MBB is a source in the induced subgraph of reachable</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/phiincominganalysis/#a218325d9a800abec0379d5d7fe8c14fb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/phiincominganalysis/#a218325d9a800abec0379d5d7fe8c14fb">predecessors</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Predecessors; &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ReachableMap.clear();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> == &amp;DefBlock) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper class that detects loops which require us to lower an i1 COPY into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// bitwise manipulation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Unfortunately, we cannot use LoopInfo because LoopInfo does not distinguish</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// between loops with the same header. Consider this example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  A-+-+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  | | |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  B-+ |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  |   |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  C---+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A is the header of a loop containing A, B, and C as far as LoopInfo is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// concerned. However, an i1 COPY in B that is used in C must be lowered to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// bitwise operations to combine results from different loop iterations when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// B has a divergent branch (since by default we will compile this code such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that threads in a wave are merged at the entry of C).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The following rule is implemented to determine whether bitwise operations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are required: use the bitwise lowering for a def in block B if a backward</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// edge to B is reachable without going through the nearest common</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// post-dominator of B and all uses of the def.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TODO: This rule is conservative because it does not check whether the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       relevant branches are actually divergent.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The class is designed to cache the CFG traversal so that it can be re-used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for multiple defs within the same basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TODO: We could use region analysis to quickly skip over SESE regions during</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       the traversal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/loopfinder"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-siloweri1copies-cpp-/loopfinder/#ad5b0bdd3a466adacd81540baaa80f08d">LoopFinder</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree">MachineDominatorTree</a> &amp;DT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepostdominatortree">MachinePostDominatorTree</a> &amp;PDT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All visited / reachable block, tagged by level (level 0 is the def block,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// level 1 are all blocks reachable including but not going through the def</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block&#39;s IPDOM, etc.).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> Visited;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Nearest common dominator of all visited blocks by level (level 0 is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// def block). Used for seeding the SSAUpdater.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> CommonDominators;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Post-dominator of all visited blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;VisitedPostDom = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Level at which a loop was found: 0 is not possible; 1 = a backward edge is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reachable without going through the IPDOM of the def block (if the IPDOM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// itself has an edge to the def block, the loop level is 2), etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FoundLoopLevel = ~0u;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;DefBlock = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> Stack;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, 4&gt;</a> NextLevel;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Lower all instructions that def or use vreg&#95;1 registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In a first pass, we lower COPYs from vreg&#95;1 to vector registers, as can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// occur around inline assembly. We do this first, before vreg&#95;1 registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are changed to scalar mask registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Then we lower all defs of vreg&#95;1 registers. Phi nodes are lowered before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// all others, because phi lowering looks through copies and can therefore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// often make copy lowering unnecessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866" lineLink="#a7cf6d1c87b479dd800293a9194aaff9a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a7cf6d1c87b479dd800293a9194aaff9a">runFixI1Copies</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinedominatortree">MachineDominatorTree</a> &amp;MDT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinepostdominatortree">MachinePostDominatorTree</a> &amp;MPDT) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only need to run this in SelectionDAG path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#ac1f888bba00f32cb4f9a0010c958f397">getProperties</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionproperties/#aacef05f16d3e71703f08bb4677e1d7a2">hasProperty</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
